titles.title: Over-the-Counter Monograph Drug User Fee Amendments
Over-the-Counter Monograph Drug User Fee Amendments
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to revise and extend the user fee program for over-the-counter monograph drugs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
